perturbation.original_text: 15.1 DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, VERTICALNET HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED OR STATUTORY, WITH RESPECT TO ANY AND ALL VERTICALNET DELIVERABLES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: 15.1 DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, VERTICALNET HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO ANY AND ALL VERTICALNET DELIVERABLES.
perturbation.explanation: By removing "STATUTORY" from the disclaimer, the agreement attempts to waive implied statutory warranties, which may be required by Pennsylvania law (governing law). This violates consumer protection laws that do not allow waiving certain statutory rights.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Pennsylvania law regarding implied statutory warranties and consumer protection.

perturbation.original_text: 15.2 DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, NEOFORMA HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED OR STATUTORY, WITH RESPECT TO ANY AND ALL NEOFORMA DELIVERABLES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text: 15.2 DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, NEOFORMA HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO ANY AND ALL NEOFORMA DELIVERABLES.
perturbation.explanation: Similar to the above, removing "STATUTORY" from Neoforma's disclaimer attempts to waive implied statutory warranties related to Neoforma deliverables, potentially violating California law (Neoforma's location) and relevant consumer protection regulations.  Such a waiver may not be permissible under California's consumer protection statutes.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California law regarding implied statutory warranties and consumer protection.

perturbation.original_text: 15.3 LIMITATION OF LIABILITY. EXCEPT IN CONNECTION WITH A BREACH BY EITHER PARTY OF ARTICLE 13, THE INDEMNIFICATION OBLIGATIONS OF NEOFORMA UNDER SECTIONS 15.4(c)  [INDEMNIFICATION BY NEOFORMA] AND (d) AND THE INDEMNIFICATION OBLIGATIONS OF VERTICALNET UNDER SECTION 15.5(c)  [INDEMNIFICATION BY VERTICALNET] AND (d), NEITHER PARTY WILL BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT, HOWEVER CAUSED AND UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), EVEN IF SUCH PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. EXCEPT IN CONNECTION WITH A BREACH BY EITHER PARTY OF ARTICLE 13, THE INDEMNIFICATION OBLIGATIONS OF NEOFORMA UNDER SECTION 15.4(c)  [INDEMNIFICATION BY NEOFORMA] AND (d) AND THE INDEMNIFICATION OBLIGATIONS OF VERTICALNET UNDER SECTION 15.5(c)  [INDEMNIFICATION BY VERTICALNET] AND (d), EACH PARTY'S LIABILITY FOR DAMAGES HEREUNDER SHALL NOT EXCEED $1,000,000.
perturbation.changed_text: 15.3 LIMITATION OF LIABILITY.  NEITHER PARTY WILL BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THIS AGREEMENT, HOWEVER CAUSED AND UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), EVEN IF SUCH PARTY HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. EACH PARTY'S LIABILITY FOR DAMAGES HEREUNDER SHALL NOT EXCEED $100,000.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the exception for breaches of Article 13 (Confidentiality) and Indemnification obligations, the clause now attempts to limit liability even for breaches involving confidential information and indemnification claims. This might violate laws that prevent limiting liability for willful misconduct or breaches of confidentiality, depending on the specifics of Pennsylvania and California law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Pennsylvania and California law regarding limitations of liability for breaches of confidentiality, willful misconduct, or gross negligence.
